data.title: Unsound reveals 'surprise' 2015 programme
data.meta_description: Unsound in Krakow has revealed its 'surprise' 2015 programme with Shackleton, Laraaji, Holly Herndon and tons more.
data.text:
Unsound has unveiled almost half of the 2015 programme.

Following up the “surprise” theme announced earlier this year, the festival has revealed which artists will be heading to Krakow in October. Individual tickets to all shows will go on sale at 12pm CEST today via Ticketpro.

This year’s programme will focus on collaborations, incluing a world premiere performance from Shackleton and Nisennenmondai’s Masako Takada and Sayaka Himeno, and Surgeon and Lady Starlight reprising their collaboration first revealed in a support slot for Lady Gaga. Charles Cohen will perform with Rabih Beani, Tin Man and Gunnar Haslam will play together as Romans, and Rabit and Kuedo will collaborate in a performance with visuals by Werkflow.

Polish jazz and noise stalwarts Tomasz Budzyński, Mikołaj Trzaska and Michał Jacaszek will collaborate as Rimbaud, and the week also features shows where one side of the collaboration is unknown, including gigs from Helena Hauff, Rob Mazurek and Ghedalia Tazartes.

Drummer Greg Fox, recently spotted playing with Ben Frost, will participate in a “Gregidency” where he’ll be joined by musicians who’ll be unknown in advance. New age maestro Laraaji will run yoga and meditation sessions, and other artists billed include jazz performer Matana Roberts, Current 93 joined by These New Puritans’ Jack Barnett, Bobbie Watson and Jon Seagrott of COMUS, Bill Orcutt of Harry Pussy and US black metal group Liturgy on a bill with Alessandro Cortini.

Thoughtful subversion comes from Holly Herndon, who will present her album Platform with special guest Colin Self, Elysia Crampton, and NON Records’ Angel-Ho and Nkisi.

The opening concert presents work by recently rediscovered minimalist composers Julius Easman and Tomasz Sikorski, presented together with Poland’s Bolt Records.

Other world premieres include the first-ever live shows from footworker Jlin, and PAN artist Visionist performing with video artist Kevin Bray. Untold will present a new audio-visual show with Emmanuel Bird, and HEALTH will play a noise-based set tapping into both their old and new sounds.

This year’s lineup at Hotel Forum includes club explorations from Andy Stott, Zenker Brothers, Levon Vincent, Aurora Halal, Galcher Lustwerk and Low Jack, plus Principe Discos artists DJ Firmeza and Nidia Minaj, NJ’s DJ UNIIQU3, RP Boo, the Golden Pudel’s Nina, Endless Crew’s Lexxi and Endgame, Poland’s Jacek Sienkiewicz, Japan’s DJ Nobu, Detroit’s DJ Bone and Glasgow’s Optimo. Room 3 on Saturday will be curated by Warsaw club night Brutaz, and Kraków’s club Szpitalna 1 will welcome Detroit’s Fit Siegel and Chicago star The Black Madonna.

Half of the line-up remains unannounced, fitting with the “surprise” theme. Find out more and get individual day tickets from Unsound’s website.

Confirmed Artists List (in random order): █████, Rob Mazurek & █████, The Black Madonna, █████, Charles Cohen and Rabih Beaini, █████, Jacek Sienkiewicz, Shackleton x Nisennenmondai, █████, █████, █████, █████, Nidia Minaj, Angel-Ho, █████, █████, █████, █████, Optimo, █████, Lexxi b2b Endgame, Nozinja, █████, DJ Bone, Rabit & Kuedo, █████, █████, Nina ,█████, █████, Bill Orcutt, █████, Rimbaud, Elysia Crampton, Low Jack, █████, Amnesia Scanner, █████, Alessandro Cortini, Surgeon & Starlight, █████, █████, █████, Romans (Tin Man & Gunnar Haslam), Matana Roberts, Sax Ruins, █████, █████, Helena Hauff b2b █████, █████, Andy Stott, Liturgy, █████, █████, Current 93, Julius Eastman & Tomasz Sikorski performed by Lutosławski Piano Duo, Joanna Duda & Mischa Kozlowski, █████, █████, █████, █████, Holly Herndon feat. Colin Self, █████, █████, Health, Galcher Lustwerk, █████, █████, █████, █████, Jlin, Levon Vincent, █████, █████, █████, Uniiqu3, █████, DJ Nobu, DJ Firmeza, █████, █████, Aurora Halal, █████, Laraaji, The Greg Fox Gregidency, █████, Nkisi, Untold, FIT Siegel, █████, Tazartès / █████ / █████, Zenker Brothers, RP Boo, █████ + More to be announced, including special projects
